name: A Hunt For The Golden Skull
name_original: A Hunt For The Golden Skull
description:
Story:

Legends says that deep in the Toxicant Woods was a secret pathway leading to the sacred Pillar Island.

It has been told that a Golden Skull is keep in the Island. What ever the skull was from still remains a mystery...

Your Goal:

Find the secret pathway and steal get the Golden Skull. 

Controls:

W - Jump

A - Left

D - Right
